11/10 EPICKA GRA

#Time2ReviewGamesByMe
[PROS]

-Fun in general
-A lot of well made maps and gamemodes (expect for mannpower)
-A lot of Achievements
-A lot of items
-A lot of people playing tf2
-High skill ceiling
-Better than overwatch :)


[Meh] - basically stuff that is not bad nor good

-Skins
-Community Servers
-Random Crits
-Casual Matchmaking
-Most of the weapons are balanced but not all

[CONS]

-Competitive Matchmaking is a joke (even after remake)
-Really toxic community
-Cheaters are everywhere (and bots)
-Updates are basically non-existents

Hello! This is my thoughts on this game.

After hitting my 500 hour mark on this game, I finnaly decided to write a review ont this game. 

[b]Pros[/b]

[list]
[*] The amazing community this game has
[*] Gameplay with a a skill celing higher than the sky
[*] Game mechanics that add a nice touch to the game
[/list]

[b]Cons[/b]

[list]
[*]Lack of greenlighting in the community workshop
[*]Lack of staff in the tf2 team
[/list]

팀포2팬이라면 꼭 퍼가 
 
 
내앞에서 스씨 욕하지마라
내앞에서 흑격기 욕하지마
내앞에서 스파이크랩 욕하지마
내앞에서 솔져 욕하지마
내앞에서 몸샷충 욕하지마
내앞에서 무앙이 욕하지마
내앞에서 농사꾼 욕하지마 
 
 
아홉남자가니한테잘못한게뭔데
아홉남자가니한테키를뜯어갓니
아홉남자가니한테모자사달라고햇니 
 
이아홉남자도눈물잇고
이아홉남자도속상하고
이아홉남자도글읽는다 
 
 
 
야 니들 
 
팀포가 만만하냐?
팀포가 쌘척해?
팀포가 싫으면 
 
 
 
그냥  있을것이지
왜 뭐라하는데? 
 
 
니들이 백스탭보다 더 고음 이쁘게 잘올라가?
니들이 메딕보다 더 귀엽고 동안이야?
니들이 무앙이보다 더 인기 많고 귀여워?
니들이 스파이보다 더 목소리 좋아?
니들이 스카웃보다 더 잘 웃게해줘?
니들이 흑격보다 더 폭격 잘해?
니들이 엔지보다 성스럽게 잘생겼어? 
 
 
니들이 용병 해봤어? 

용병이 얼마나 힘든지도 모르면서 
 
직접 본 실체도 아니면서 
 
니들멋대로 생각하지마. 
 
니들은 뭐 잘한거있니? 
 
니들이 뭔데 신문을 퍼뜨려? 
 
팀포 는..
 
팀포는 말이야... 
 
'용병'이라는 이름을 가지기 위해서 힘들고 고된 노력을 한후에야 이렇게 됬다고, 
 
그런데 니들 그거알아? 
 
니들이.. 
 
니네같은 얘들때문에.. 
 
 
지금 이자리까지 겨우 올라왔는데... 
 
 
니들이  팀포2 이름 망치고 있는거야... 
 
차라리 욕을 할거면.... 
 
우리욕을 하든가... 
 
괜히 Mann.Co 힘들게 하지말고... 
 
 
너네 그거....명예훼손인거 알아?? 
 
근데도 욕하는거 재밌니?? 
 
진짜 양심없다 
 
 
나도 이런글 올리기 싫어. 
 
 
 
근데 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
니들때문에 올리는 거야... 
 
 
 
니들이 팀포2, 밸브 욕할 자격있어? 
 
 
팀포2 니들 한테 죄지었냐? 
 
우리가 모자도 고번도 모르는 니네한테 죄지었냐고; 
 
아무것도 안했는데.... 
 
제대로 알지도 못하면서... 
 
그냥 
 
괜히 
 
 
 
 
 
팀포2가 싫어서 
 
 
 
허위신고 하고.....
엄마욕 하고..... 
 
 
재밌냐?
재밌어?? 
 
 
니들이 한번당해봐...... 
 
 
 
 
열심히 노력해서 겨우 이 자리까지  올라왔는데...... 
 
 
 
 
 
니들같은 오렌지충들 한테 욕먹는 팀포2 입장에서 생각해봐! 
 
 
어때? 
 
 
 
기분나쁘지?? 
 
 
니들...이글보면서  '아니.','안재밌는데?'이러면서 비꼬듯이 말할거지? 
 
 
지금 위에 보고 "짜증나는애들참"이라고 하는 얘또 있을거야.... 
 
 
 
니들 .. 
 
명심해라..... 
 
 
팀포2 욕하는 오렌지충 내가 다 신고할수있다..... 
 
 
명예훼손으로.... 
 
 
그러니..... 
 
 
 
 
 
조심해.... 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
그리고 
 
 
 
좋은 말로 할때  팀포2 욕하지마..... 
 
 
 
진정한 팀포2팬들이라면 꼭 퍼가.... 
 
 
꼭 퍼트리삼

Tf2 everyday is so fun never gets boring, sometimes it does frustrate me but tf2 gives you the option to play competitive matches if you want to get serious or just play a casual match or just mess around with community servers. tf2 has its ups and downs, its not the best TEAM based game but if you're looking for a game with a goofy style and just to have fun with, this is the game for you.  It is also a great fps game. For a game so old its still strives forward and is still the top 5 played most games on steam everdyay, it continues to keep the fun of pc gaming in me.

솔직히 오렌지 서버의 비중이 너무 크다 그러다보니
유저들이 한국서버에서 다양성을 찼지 못하구있는 추세이다
(그지들) 지들은 현질 안해놓고 사면 돈 아깝냐, 부모님 돈 안아깝냐
좃도 지랄 하는 애들 뺴면 좋으나 언유 거래서버 같은것이 없어 사실상
대리를 사용하지만 사기 너무 많은게 흠이다

그러면 언유 거래서버를 만들어 그지 깽깽이들아!
앞서 말했드시 한국인들은 무료를 좋아하는걸로 나는 각인이 돼어있기에 만들다해고 좃도 금방 망할듯

거래섭은 등신아!
거래서버 있지만 그래도 달라고 징징 거리거나 딜 처주라고 징 거리는애 몇 얼추 본적이 있다

This game at its core is a great multiplayer fps. Fun/funny classes, fun game play... it's all there really. The only true downside is the rampant cheating, absolutely terrible community, and lack of communication and care from Valve. The current form of this game is nothing more than a machine that prints money for Valve. There is no upkeep, no innovation, no nothing. Valve relies on an active modding community to even come up with the items, maps and ideas. It's pretty terrible.

[i] 4079h of playtime, at the time of this review.  Damn. How to review a 10 years old game? [/i]
 
[h1] PROS[/h1]
+[b]The balance.[/b] You can enter in this game and actually play with the stock basic weapons of each class and you'll not be in disadvantage. Every weapon has its ups and downs in the most variety of situations. Its hard to find a multiplayer game with this kind of balance. 
+[b]9 great classes[/b]. Can you think on a 10th class? In my opinion this game managed to get all playing forms into 9 different classes,  each one unique,  each one with its ups and downs,  just like the weapons. Once again,  great balance. 
+[b]Game modes.[/b] You'll have a bunch of different game modes to play.  Capture points, payload, payload race, king of the hill,  capture the flag,  and so many more,  even in community servers..  There's everything. You can even play freakin' hide n' seek. 
+[b]Microtransactions done right. [/B] Everything you can buy in-game doesn't give you any advantage while playing.  You can either get tools, cosmetic items or weapons which,  as said before, will not get the game unfair.  True F2P,  and not P2W. 
+[b]Variety of weapons,  maps and cosmetics.[/b] This game has everything. 
+[b]Competitive and casual gaming included. [/b]
+[b] Seasonal events.[/b] Halloween, Christmas,  etc,  gets you special gaming period with game modifications. Halloween is great! 
+[b]10 years of updates and counting. [/b] How many games get this support? 
+[b]Humor.[/b] Voice lines are awesome. And taunts. Just awesome. 
+[b]TF2 Economy. [/b] This game has its own economy and it was one of the first games that introduced trading system. Maybe it was the first?
+ Its F2P!  Try it! 

[h1] CONS[/h1] 
- [b]Weapons nerfs and buffs[/b]. Over the years we had changes in the weapons.  Some were need.. Others not so much. And some are still needed to this day. Its not easy,  but the weapons could have a better analysis in this topic,  I think. 
- [b]Bugs after big updates[/b]. My years  of experiencing this game showed me that after a big update comes a roll of problems,  usually resolved after a small period of...  Days? 
- [b] Too many items[/b]. The game got to a point where there are so many,  so many,  but sooo many items... Dont get me wrong,  its cool to have items but..  Kinda exagerating now? So many crates with so much cosmetic items..
-[b]Reskin weapons[/b].  Weapons with same stats of others..  But reskined? I'd prefer that each weapon had unique stats.  And this comes all the way back from the first years of the game.  

[h1] OVERALL 9.8/10[/h1] - [b] [i] The game of a lifetime[/i] [/b]

alright my little infernos, settle down, i know this is the review you were waiting for so here it is:
TF2 Is a fast paced, character based, blast, slice, beatem type of shooter where anything can happen and the rewards are GLORIOUS. I know what youre thinking, 'shooting and looting? how can that be any fun, james?' WELL LET ME TELL YOU-
The gunplay is addictive, furious and unforgiving- the recoil adds a tangible weight to every mouse click, and the brutality makes you feel like a war machine. But where the real magic happens is in the loot. THE LOOT, GAMERS- YOU HEAR THAT? Thats right. IF youre like me you cannot resist a funny cosmetic hat, a charming weapon skin, or possibly a sultry costume to fill your thoughts and keep you hooked when youre in the IRL. My followers, my fellows, my ladies, GET. THIS. FR***ING. GAME. --- See you on the battlefield--- Forever Inferno, Signing off.
